The truffled eggs are fantastic.  Very rich with a mild flavor.  You can't have too much of it so it works fine with the amount they serve.  Very expensive at 16 Euros but worth the taste.  The honey ribs were good as well.  The sangria was fresh though small for the 1/2 L.  Get the full Liter as it equates to other restaurants 1/2 pitcher.  Not standard units of measure.  The creme foam dessert wasn't substantial enough so pass on that.  There must be a better dessert than that that we didn't try on the menu.  Small space and got to watch the chefs in action.  They must have their processes executed exactly as there is not much room for four of them to work in that space.
